channel.title: Chang-TV
channel.description: Chang-TV is a weekly music news round-up with special guests, interviews and even has its very own Letterman band.(well house drummer at least!) The show is strongly focused around music making. May The Chang be with you.....
channel.itunes:author: The Heavy Chang
channel.itunes:subtitle: Chang-TV is a weekly music news round-up with special guests, interviews and even has its very own Letterman band.(well house drummer at least!) The show is strongly focused around music making. May The Chang be with you.....

item.title: Chang-TV s01e05
item.description:
Ola Onabule and Dario Boente (performing with Louie Vega’s Elements Of Life) join The Chang for episode 5.
Ola is one of London’s most established soul/funk artists. We check out his gig at the 606
item.itunes:subtitle: Ola Onabule and Dario Boente (performing with Louie Vega’s Elements Of Life) join The Chang for episode 5. Ola is one of London’s most established soul/funk artists. We check out his gig at the 606
item.itunes:summary: Ola Onabule and Dario Boente (performing with Louie Vega’s Elements Of Life) join The Chang for episode 5. Ola is one of London’s most established soul/funk artists. We check out his gig at the 606 Club. Dario Boente performs with Louie Vega at the Coronet in south London. Great interview and some bangin concert footage of The Elements Of Life. Peace The Chang

item.title: Chang-TV s01e04
item.description:
The Bone Idols and The Bellagios join us this week. Bone Idols are U.K. producers taking their sounds stateside. We meet them in their London studio.
The Bellagios play a killer gig at Guanabara. The
item.itunes:subtitle: The Bone Idols and The Bellagios join us this week. Bone Idols are U.K. producers taking their sounds stateside. We meet them in their London studio. The Bellagios play a killer gig at Guanabara. The
item.itunes:summary: The Bone Idols and The Bellagios join us this week. Bone Idols are U.K. producers taking their sounds stateside. We meet them in their London studio. The Bellagios play a killer gig at Guanabara. The Chang catch up with them backstage. The house band Musical Director gives us the weekly Britney 10second scoop.. Peace and out.

item.title: Chang-TV s01e03
item.description:
In this episode we meet Blackbeard and DJ Morphingaz.
Blackbeard have done the UK remixes of Jill Scott ‘Golden’ and Jamiroquai ‘Seven days in sunny June’. Also blowing up on the iTunes music store i
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we meet Blackbeard and DJ Morphingaz. Blackbeard have done the UK remixes of Jill Scott ‘Golden’ and Jamiroquai ‘Seven days in sunny June’. Also blowing up on the iTunes music store i
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we meet Blackbeard and DJ Morphingaz. Blackbeard have done the UK remixes of Jill Scott ‘Golden’ and Jamiroquai ‘Seven days in sunny June’. Also blowing up on the iTunes music store is their rework of Max Sedgley ‘Happy’.(featuring the ramsmachine on guitar) DJ Morphingaz is an Australian Scratch sensation now based in London. Of course our M.D. Dov Skipper brings us the weekly 10 second Britney Spears scoop. This episode ROCKS !!

www.diggnation.com

item.title: Chang-TV s01e02
item.description:
Mica Paris speaks to The Chang backstage after a gig at Smollensky’s in London and we also have some great concert footage.
Bobby Boyd chats with AKA Nobody, a U.S artist based in London.
Dov brin
item.itunes:subtitle: Mica Paris speaks to The Chang backstage after a gig at Smollensky’s in London and we also have some great concert footage. Bobby Boyd chats with AKA Nobody, a U.S artist based in London. Dov brin
item.itunes:summary: Mica Paris speaks to The Chang backstage after a gig at Smollensky’s in London and we also have some great concert footage. Bobby Boyd chats with AKA Nobody, a U.S artist based in London. Dov brings us the latest Britney 10 second weekly scoop and also faces a drum challenge. All this plus the latest international music news. So good we go straight to podcast!!! Peace
